experience.description: Developed a comprehensive site management system using modern React technologies to streamline content and data management operations.
responsibilities: Built full-stack site management application with React and TypeScript
Implemented modern UI components using shadcn-ui and Radix UI
Developed data visualization dashboards with Recharts
Integrated form validation with React Hook Form and Zod
Created responsive layouts with Tailwind CSS
Implemented routing and navigation with React Router
Built reusable component library with Lucide React icons
Managed application state with TanStack Query
achievements: Implemented modern design system with 40+ UI components
Built scalable architecture with TypeScript for type safety
Created intuitive user interface for efficient content management

experience.description: Developed a document management system for digitalization and automation of archive storage and sharing.
